byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and LISA W. FODERARO

abstract: Coyote eludes New York City police following three-hour chase in vicinity of Riverside Park on Manhattan's Upper West Side; incident, beginning with 911 call, raises questions about city's commitment to allow predators to remain in parks.
lead_paragraph: Officers lost the coyote’s trail near Grant’s Tomb in Riverside Park, but planned to do periodic patrols throughout the day.

headline.main: A Coyote Eludes the Police on the Upper West Side
headline.print_headline: A Coyote Eludes the Police on the Upper West Side

snippet: Officers lost the coyote’s trail near Grant’s Tomb in Riverside Park, but planned to do periodic patrols throughout the day.
